reviews.review: Take Portal to the next level. Will keep you entertained the whole time, both with really  clever gameplay and with amusing story. The dialogues are wonderful, and so is this game. All the above is taken into account two times considering the cooperative mode, so this game's doubly recommended (if you have friends to play it with).
Play it. For Science.
get it...now...why are u still reading go get it damm you. this is now one of my top favorite games...and thats just the single player *-*
Portal goes on, this time in co-op mode, hillarious!!

The Single-player is AWESOME!  and the Co-Op is a TON of fun.   I thought it might be hard to communicate in co-op but the controlls Valve came up with to help you and your teammate work together are top notch.  A grea all-around game, going to go down as an all-time great.  Must have!

I've completed both co-op and single player, and this game is least as good as the original. Probably better.

The tone of the game isn't as much of a novelty this time around, but that doesn't mean it's not enjoyable.

Play it with a friend!
THIS GAME IS EPIC!!
Short like the original but worth every second
It's pure, distilled, dangerously concentrated awesomeness. (with some fairy and unicorn dust sprinkled all over)
Simply the best single player Valve game ever.
Amazing.
Epic, fun logic game from master of story telling - i'm giving Valve 9.5 of 10 cakes
There's never been a better romp through a superscience facility than this, a lot of the puzzles require a ton of cleverness, and the game was awesome and interesting the whole way through.
If you buy only one game this year, buy this. Co-Op was the most fun I've had in ages. Bring a friend!

Muitas palavras poderiam definir Portal 2, mas no momento penso apenas em uma: Fabuloso. O jogo é espetacular em todos os sentidos. Os gráficos estão maravilhosos, mostrando que a valve consegue tirar leita de pedra com essa engine source, os personagens (leia GLaDOS) que continuam carismáticos e a história, que se mostrou mais profunda que o primeiro e mais atrelada ao universo Half Life. Quem já jogou e gostou do primeiro, Portal 2 é obrigatório. Quem nunca jogou, compre os 2, jogue na ordem e se apaixone.
Fantastic.  This game is talked about, but is still not given enough credit!
Amazingly well written, and a heap of fun.
If you haven't played it, you're wrong.
It's Portal 2.  And it's hilarious.
The writing and voice-acting in this game is (without hyperbole) COMIC GENIUS. The rest of the game is fantastic as well. One of the all-time greatest titles of this generation.

Well, I can honestly (and objectively) say that Portal 2 succeeds the first Portal in every way; with improved graphics, a grander story, and maintaining its signature dark humour, playing Portal 2 is like slipping on an old but comfortable pair of shoes...only these shoes try to kill you with science. And jello.
I. Love. This. This is the game I've been waiting for since Portal. Well done, Valve. Well done.

This is by far the most work valve has ever put into one of their games and it shows. Graphic are just stunning and the game runs very smooth as butter.I'm not sure what they've did to make this game run so well, but it runs really superduper well. Better than portal 1 and halflife 2. The story is epic. if you haven't played portal 1 I suggest you get it so you can at least know a bit to what is going on in portal 2.
Valve did a great job on this game and it is the best game I have ever played. Portal 2 deserves a 6/5 stars from me.
Portal 2 improves on Portal in so many ways it is indeed crazy. For me, this is the Half-Life 3 we never got. One of the best co-op games of the last 10 years - without any doubt.
Pretty much made of lots of wins and brain farts.

An action sci-fi masterpiece, with an epic soundtrack, and immersive ambiance only rivaled by Metroid Prime and Bio Shock. This game satisfies a full compliment of emotions, and serves as the bigger deeper sibling of the lighthearted original. Solving the puzzles is only the beginning.
virtually perfect
This game rocks
This game is the absolute bomb.  I recommend it to anyone who loved the first one, you will simply adore this one!
A little more comic relief has been added.  Glados is as sarcastic and mean as ever.  Multiplayer seems cool so far but I haven't played a lot.  You have to have this game if you are a gamer.
What do you think? Of course its a fucking awesome game.
Why the hell dont you own this ?

exelente, gran titulo, muy buena la continuacion de la historia y con mucha mas trama que el primero, sin lugar a dudas este juego se a ganado un puesto en mi coleccion de juegos favoritos, mejoramiento de graficas y con el mismo motor source, mas duradero el juego en modo camapaña y mas gozador.

PD:si vas a comprar este titulo te aconsejo que compres tambien el portal para que tengas un entendimiento claro de la historia en si.

gran titulo, recomendado.

Why write a recommendation when everyone knows this game is good anyways?

Portal 2 is significantly longer and more difficult than the first Portal. The game took me 5.4 hours to finish Singleplayer and the Co-op can add even more time to that. The graphics and engine seem to be much improved, it is by far the best looking Source game right now. The writing is still top notch and comical. I thoroughly enjoyed this game and I think it was worth 50 dollars.

This is not your typical copy paste sequel. The campaign is so much longer than expected, plenty of new features for puzzles as well as humour that surpasses the original. The new characters tie in flawlessly, especially Wheatley voiced by Stephen Merchant. Co-op has no doubt had a lot of effort put into it too as I'm willing to say it is in my top three 2 player games. I do feel it needs a leaderboards system or chamber challenges of some kind but that wont stop me from playing it several times over for the fun of it.

A very solid game, one of the best experiences you will have alone or with a friend. Although it has little replayability, which dampens it a bit but it's definately worth the first run though. Beautiful architecture, animations, graphics, and voice work.

Oh and hats.
An excellent game and story line.
Amazing game with a great story and superb characters! Best game I've played in a while.
It's everything I'd imagined it would be. A full-length Portal game with the same humor and wit as the first. A clear contender for GOTY.

2019 Edit:
I miss when Valve made masterpieces...

Original 2011 Review:

Whelp, I just finished CO-OP so I might as well write a review. 
 
Heres the deal, alot of people are complaining that the single player is too short. 
 
The primary reason this is an issue with Portal or Portal 2 is because there is pretty much nothing that delays you, such as other characters. This is less noticeable in Portal 2, but it is still there. Now it took  me around 6 hours to finish single-player and that is long enough for a FPS. 
 
The story, in my opinion, was amazing. It is one of the few games that kept me guessing. It's  characters are well written and Stephen Merchant, Ellen McLain, and J.K. Simmons did a marvelous job as voice actors. Wheatley, Stephen's character. Is hilarious and immediately brings you into the game. The story has a comical approach that fits Portal 1's humor. 
 
I do not have many characters left to talk about co-op. It took me and a friend around 6 hours and was, challenging at times. Which is a good thing.
What's to say?  Better than Portal 1 (which was amazing) with significantly more content and added co-op.  Can't WAIT to play co-op.

Check it out, two fucking nerd songs! But if you're going to be one of those fucking whiner babies who complains about the ARG and about the first day DLC that does nothing whatsoever and how you could beat the campaign in four hours, then I guess that's your stupid fuckhead opinion.

Even after so many years I'm still surprised with the effect this game had on my life. It really changed my perception of games in general, as an art. Really wish Valve would come back to this universe.

Everything a sequel should be and more. The only game worth $50. The single player is four times as long plus co-op. BUY THIS GAME.

This is the most fun and exciting game I have ever played. It might seem a bit short, but it packs more excitement, brain teasers and funny dialog than any longer game out there.
It's a masterpiece theres nothing more I can say. Just play it...seriously.

Réussir une suite à Portal, Valve vient de faire un exploit ! Bien plus consistant en solo, très fun en coop. Portal 2 est une immense claque. Tout ce qui faisait le charme du premier est encore là. Retrouvez GlaDoS et littéralement plongez dans le lore avec d'incroyables salles aux énigmes designé avec brio. Juste admirable.
One of the most amazing games I've ever played!
Hahah Crazy game ! i love it ! xD
This is a nice relaxing game to play and funny too. Well worth listening to whats being said dialgue wise. The puzzles are not hard to figure out and satisfying to beat.
Superbe campagne Solo et mode Co-op vraiment excellent. Un jeu vraiment excellent au niveau environnement, gameplay et énigme.

It brings me back to Portal and kicking GLaDOS robot ASS!!! I recommend this because it goes deeper into the testing areas and more story and if you haven't played the original I would play that first then jump on to this masterpeice...
Eine Wahnsinns Story, viele tolle neuerungen, klasse Humor und wie immer irre Testkammern! Portal 2 ist ein voller erfolg und für jeden wärmstens zu empfehlen
just get it lol its portal with multiplayer=win

Качественно, здоровый юмор, простенькие задачки и эффектно меняющееся окружение. Есть отсылки к Half-Life.

P.S. Рекомендую играть с английской озвучкой, Стивен Мерчант в роли Уитли просто жжот утюгом.

Portal 2. Dlouho očekávaná logická hra viděná z první osoby. Perfektně kombinuje příběh, interakci postav, logické hříčky, geniálnost scénáristy a parádní hlášky. Po celou dobu přibližně 6-7 hodinové kampaně, při prvním průjezdu hrou, jsem se neustále bavil :-) Prostředí propracované do posledních detajlů ve spojení s dostatkem tak akorát složitých puzzlů a šťavnatých dialogů, díky kterým jsem se několikrát div nesvalil smíchy z křesla na zem, dávají pojmu "logická hra" nový rozměr. Třešničkou na dortu je pak kooperativní multiplayer (ideálně, pokud jste vybaveni mikrofonem), který doslova bere dech. 

Celkově nejlepší hra posledních let. Uděluji 9,6/10 (-0,1 za absenci stínů postavy a -0,3 za placené čepičky a další hovadiny)
Superb. Humorous and entertaining. Not as challenging as the first portal, but very polished.

The co-op is very fun cooperating. It does get somewhat confusing at first cause there are 4 portals, and sometimes you have to go through all of 'em in like 3 seconds. 
Also it's funny.

Awesome plot and great execution.  If you're into the lore of Portal 1, there's a lot of content here.  If you're not, still a fun game with several new mechanics.

Coops pretty fun too.
This game is awesome. The graphics are great, the story is awesome, and you can even play multiplayer. So yeah. Good game.

As Valve's first full length game since Half life 2 in 2004, Portal 2 doesn't disappoint. It manages to stuff in so many new mechanics and not feel overbearing within its roughly 9 hour long single player campaign. The co-op is amazingly well done: having 4 portals and the new mechanics to play with as a team with a friend; this is Portal like it's never been.
It's cool

High quality game. No bugs, no wrong ideas. This is the standard for a sequel. This is what they should all be like. Great updated engine, superb gameplay and storyline (both co-op and single player), and great new additions. I can't really explain alot of the new additions without spoling things. Watch the videos on the store page to get some idea. But this game isn't a game. Its an immersion experience. With star studded talent from valve backing up this amazing game, destiny shows that once again they have released a shiny, flawless product. If you find anything wrong with this game, well...aren't you special?
